product_name: SmartWool Outdoor Sport Light Crew Socks - Women's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Perfect for everyday adventures when you need minimal cushioning, the SmartWool Outdoor Sport Light Crew socks offer crucial protection without being heavy or cumbersome.
